history.proof: intros x y H1 H2. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zle_sign_pos_neg,Z. qsimpl time: 1 use: Zle_sign_pos_neg,Z. apply Z.ge_le_iff. hauto use: Z.le_mul_0, Z.ge_le_iff, Z.compare_antisym unfold: Z.le, CompOpp.

exceptions.tactic: apply Zle_sign_pos_neg with (x := Z.mul x y) (y := y) in H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : Z, 0 <= x -> y <= 0 -> x * y <= 0" on hypothesis of type "x * y <= 0".
In environment H : forall x y : Z, 0 <= x -> y <= 0 -> x * y <= 0 x, y : Z H2 : x * y <= 0 H3 : (x ?= 0) = Lt Unable to unify "x * y <= 0" with "0 <= y".
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros x y H1 H2. apply Zle_sign_pos_neg with (x := Z.mul x y) (y := y) in H2. - apply H2. - apply H1.
